Welcome to Photometry Factory for RAPAS's documentation!
========================================================

**Photometry Factory for RAPAS (PFR)** is a Python-based tool designed for astronomical image processing and photometry with focus on RAPAS (RÃ©seau Amateur Professionnel pour les Alertes) data.

The application provides a streamlined workflow for image calibration, astrometry, and photometric analysis of astronomical images.

Features
--------

* FITS image calibration (bias, dark, flat)
* Automatic plate solving and WCS coordinate determination
* Source detection and aperture photometry
* PSF photometry with automatic PSF modeling
* Zero-point calibration with Gaia DR3 catalog
* Cross-matching with multiple astronomical catalogs
* Interactive visualization
* Export to standard formats
